body: ``c_api.cc`` and ``c_api.h`` have to change because ``pywrap_tensorflow_internal.py`` is generated from them, however I found that change should be rather minimal and touch only ``TFE_ContextOptionsSetAsync()`` and ``TFE_ContextSetAsyncForThread()``
body_html: c_api.cc and c_api.h have to change because pywrap_tensorflow_internal.py is generated from them, however I found that change should be rather minimal and touch only TFE_ContextOptionsSetAsync() and TFE_ContextSetAsyncForThread()
body_text: c_api.cc and c_api.h have to change because pywrap_tensorflow_internal.py is generated from them, however I found that change should be rather minimal and touch only TFE_ContextOptionsSetAsync() and TFE_ContextSetAsyncForThread()
